entry.value: Input data table containing columns to be processed including e.g. grouping columns

Metanode for imputation of selected values using several techniques.%%00010%%00010Metanode enables selection of data columns to be processed, no need to preselect them in advance.%%00010%%00010Imputation can be done using whole table minimum/quantile or using column specific minimum/quantile values. Grouping column(s) can be selected to apply global minimum imputation method groupwise.%%00010%%00010Value for imputation is at first replaced by string and then replaced by specified number to enable different values imputation.%%00010%%00010Multiplying factor is used to multiply the calculated number (e.g. global median) to be used for the imputation in all selected imputation types.%%00010%%00010Metanode returns full data matrix with imputed values or processed columns only.%%00010%%00010ATTENTION!: if you select blank normalized column suffix and not used columns will be returned, original data in processed columns will be rewritten by the normalized ones! This is desired behavior.%%00010%%00010=================%%00010%%00010Used programs and tools and their respective licenses at the time of the metanode creation. Version numbers and the licenses might differ based on your local installation. Please inspect your local installation and contact us if you can not locate your local version and or license terms.%%00010%%00010KNIME nodes (The KNIME nodes consists of the following GNU GPL 3.0 License. Licence terms are available here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)%%00010Python 3 (The Python consists of the following Python 3 License. Licence terms are available here: https://docs.python.org/3/license.html)%%00010Python package Pandas (The Pandas consists of the following BSD License. Licence terms are available here: https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause)%%00010Python package Numpy (The Numpy consists of the following BSD License. Licence terms are available here: https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause)%%00010%%00010The metanode was created in KNIME 4.7.7 running inside the docker image (https://hub.docker.com/r/cfprot/knime/), tag 4.7.7a.%%00010%%00010=================%%00010%%00010This version of metanode is available under the GNU GPL 3.0 License, unless stated otherwise. The full version of the license terms is available at https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html.%%00010Version: 1.1.1 from 2023-12-12%%00010Contact person: David Potesil (david.potesil@ceitec.muni.cz)%%00010More information can be found at https://github.com/OmicsWorkflows/KNIME_metanodes.
